customer_journey.awareness: Begins with performance gap recognition through board pressure (42%), competitive benchmarking (28%), or investor demands (30%). CEOs typically research 8-12 consulting firms through peer recommendations, industry publications, and speaking engagements. Initial exploration phase spans 2-3 months involving discrete inquiries and capability presentations
customer_journey.consideration: 4-6 week formal RFP process comparing 3-5 firms on expertise depth, methodology rigor, team seniority, and ROI track record. 71% prioritize industry-specific experience, 29% value functional expertise. Reference checks with 3-4 previous clients standard. Chemistry meetings with proposed team critical for 67% of decisions
customer_journey.decision: Final selection within 10-14 days driven by partner involvement commitment (38%), proposed approach uniqueness (31%), and cultural fit (31%). Contract negotiations average 2 weeks focusing on success metrics, resource allocation, and fee structure. 73% require board or investor approval for engagements over $500K
customer_journey.retention: Average engagement length 8.7 months with 67% extending beyond initial scope. Quarterly business reviews maintain alignment. 45% of clients engage for multiple projects over 3-year period. Success-based renewals depend on measurable impact delivery within first 90 days
customer_journey.advocacy: Peak advocacy 6-12 months post-engagement when results materialize. Board presentations and investor meetings generate highest-quality referrals. 82% of Fortune 500 executives recommend consultants within peer networks. Case study participation occurs with 23% of clients

proven_hooks.hook_pattern: Contrarian/Myth-Busting: 'Why [common belief] is killing your [desired outcome]'
proven_hooks.example: Why your digital transformation is failing (and what to do instead) - McKinsey article headline
proven_hooks.why_it_works: Challenges conventional wisdom; creates cognitive dissonance; positions consultant as having insider knowledge; implies reader may be making costly mistakes
proven_hooks.source: McKinsey Insights articles, Harvard Business Review consulting content analysis

proven_hooks.example: How we helped a PE-backed manufacturer achieve 40% EBITDA improvement in 18 months
proven_hooks.why_it_works: Provides social proof; specific numbers increase credibility; timeframe shows feasibility; speaks directly to ROI-focused executives
proven_hooks.source: Deloitte case studies, Bain & Company client stories

proven_hooks.hook_pattern: Urgent Warning: 'The [specific threat] that [percentage] of [industry] leaders are missing'
proven_hooks.example: The competitive blind spot that's costing mid-market CEOs $2M+ annually
proven_hooks.why_it_works: Creates FOMO and urgency; uses specificity to build credibility; implies exclusive insight; triggers loss aversion psychology
proven_hooks.source: BCG thought leadership, Gartner research headlines

proven_hooks.example: The 5-stage roadmap to predictable, scalable growth (used by 100+ mid-market leaders)
proven_hooks.why_it_works: Promises structured approach (reduces perceived risk); specific number creates completeness; social proof through adoption numbers; appeals to desire for proven methodology
proven_hooks.source: EOS Worldwide content, Scaling Up methodology marketing

proven_hooks.hook_pattern: Insider Secret: 'What [aspirational group] knows about [topic] that you don't'
proven_hooks.example: What private equity firms look for in operational due diligence (that most CEOs overlook)
proven_hooks.why_it_works: Creates knowledge gap; positions reader as aspiring to elite group; implies actionable insider information; leverages authority of reference group

proven_hooks.hook_pattern: Timely/Trend: '[Current event/trend] is changing [industry aspect] - here's what it means for you'
proven_hooks.example: AI is reshaping competitive strategy - 3 moves to make now before your competitors do
proven_hooks.why_it_works: Leverages current relevance; creates urgency through competitive framing; positions consultant as forward-thinking; promises actionable response
proven_hooks.source: McKinsey Quarterly, BCG Henderson Institute content

proven_hooks.hook_pattern: Problem Agitation: 'Still [struggling with X]? You're not alone - and it's not your fault'
proven_hooks.example: Still fighting fires instead of scaling? The hidden systems gap in 90% of growth companies
proven_hooks.why_it_works: Validates reader's pain; removes personal blame (increases receptivity); creates community (not alone); implies external/systemic solution needed
proven_hooks.source: Consulting firm email subject lines, LinkedIn ad copy analysis
